recommended_degree: Logistik, Bisnis Logistik, Logistik Bisnis, Logistik Kelautan, Manajemen Logistik (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Warehouse Admin 
1. Melaksanakan tugas administrasi SAP controling 
2. Melakukan Proses penagihan Invoice
3. Memanajemen Jam kerja Warehouse Staff 
4. Melakukan report pengiriman barang 
5. Memfasilitasi proses projek di pergudangan 
6. Melakukan proses Inbound, Outbound , Replanish
